I even moved from the UK to the US to get away from her (just moving cities did no good - she‚Äôd find my address and be at the house at 4am hammering on the door and screaming... I just couldn‚Äôt understand how I couldn‚Äôt be rid of her, but eventually she was all I knew; she‚Äôd driven away all my friends and I felt completely useless and worthless. Gives me shivers listening to her. I was always apologising for nothing. Balling my eyes out. Being so depressed when he shouted at me the way amber does. The moment I cut things off he realised something. It took me 8 years to get to that point of cutting it off. The last year of the rs I started seeing that he was on drugs. I felt so dumb for not knowing. But he was functioning and has ADHD. So I thought it was normal. How ignorant of me. But nobody knew. 

But the moment I left he fell apart. But.. He quit the drugs after 20 years of using (but functioning. It's crazy but he was able to do so. And he used daily so thats still mind-blowing to me) and now I see his true colors and he's the sweetest person there is. He actually cares all of a sudden. And works his ass off to stay clean. Unbelievable. But he was sweeping me off my feet when we fell in love with the same things. The highs are very high and great but the lows are hell.
